title: Financial and Economic Framework
summary: Defines financial metrics (ARPU, churn, CLV) and formulas linking churn reduction to EBITDA and network IRR.

title: Network Economics and IRR Models
summary: Covers capex structure, utilization curves, and ROI modeling for LTE/5G and fiber builds.

title: Product & Pricing Elasticity
summary: Explains elasticity coefficients, ARPU optimization, and promotion decay patterns by segment.

title: Customer Lifecycle Analytics
summary: Describes analytics across acquisition, usage, care, renewal, churn, and win-back stages.

title: Modeling Frameworks
summary: Outlines modeling approaches including binary, survival, uplift, sequence, and reinforcement learning.

title: Operational Integration
summary: Integrates churn models into CRM workflows, trigger design, and retention campaign ROI measurement.

title: Geospatial & Competitive Analytics
summary: Defines spatial features and mapping for competitor density, porting, and coverage impact on churn.
